api_list.name: /reviews/search.json
api_list.description: Search for movie reviews.  Supports filtering by Critics' Pick.

optional_parameters.name: publication-date
optional_parameters.description: Review publication date range. Start and end dates separated by colon (e.g. 1930-01-01:1940-01-01).

optional_parameters.name: reviewer
optional_parameters.description: Filter by reviewer byline (e.g. Stephen Holden).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Sets the starting point of the result set (0, 20, ...).  Used to paginate thru results. Defaults to 0. The has_more field indicates the response has more results.

optional_parameters.name: opening-date
optional_parameters.description: U.S. opening date range. Start and end dates separated by colon (e.g. 1930-01-01:1940-01-01).

optional_parameters.name: critics-pick
optional_parameters.description: Set to Y to only show critics' picks.  Otherwise shows both.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Field to order results by (e.g. by-publication-date).

api_list.name: /critics/{reviewer}.json
api_list.description: Get movie critics. You can either specify the reviewer name or use "all", "full-time", or "part-time".

required_parameters.name: reviewer
required_parameters.description: Reviewer name or "all" for all reviewers, "full-time" for full-time reviewers, or "part-time" for part-time reviewers.

status.description: Status of the critic (full-time, part-time, or null).

seo-name.description: Critic name for URL (spaces are replaced with hyphens and periods removed).

type.description: Type of resource (always set to image).

api_list.name: /reviews/{type}.json
api_list.description:
Get movie reviews.  Can filter to only return Critics' Picks.
Supports ordering results by-publication-date or by-opening-date.
Use offset to paginate thru results, 20 at a time.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Filter by critics' pick or not.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Sets the starting point of the result set.  Needs to be multiple of 20.
